column5: hi everyone i just bought a new boat and i cant wait to get out on the water does any one know if lake simcoe if clear of ice or any other lake within 2 hour drive from toronto?  thanks

Welcome to the board acrimi.I know when I first got my new boat I couldnt wait for soft water either.So we headed out to Lake Ontario in search of some bows.Just uncovered it this weekend and repacked the wheel bearings and we will be out next weekend for sure.Dan
sorry bud, everything is still frozen up this way.  With the weather coming this week, might be opening up sooner than expected though
we were out today for a bit and there is still 10" plus of ice, i dont recomend anyone going out though lots of soft spots now. infact today was our last trip out for pike.
